resources.string: Click this button to add the widget to your home screen
This application calculates the required dosage of insulin for injection using the formula:\n\n(current sugar level - desired sugar level) รท coefficient = number of units
It is not possible to add a widget from the app on your Android device. Please type in Google: "How to add widgets to the home screen in Android" to add them manually, or click the button below.
Here is the \"how to use\" guide

This is a non-commercial application, and it will remain free forever. No advertising, no data collection/processing, etc. If you have any suggestions for improvement, please leave them on the application page.
